attributes.action: get Ministers & MP's, when bringing in new laws to lead by example, instead of,  do as we say.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: For example, climate change. We are constantly being told to turn things off, don't leave them on standby, buy fuel efficient cars, I notice the government are still riding around in big cars, and doing short trips in them. And I am sure that the lights on public buildings do not have to be on all night.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
